name: Dark Privacytools.io
additional_info:
07/17/19 - fixed dark theme for service recommendation
03/30/19 - dark theme for https://search.privacytools.io/
12/9/18 - dark header
11/4/18 - applied dark theme on card-body
css:
@-moz-document domain("privacytools.io") {
body,
.card-body,
.jumbotron,
.panel,
table[data-sortable].sortable-theme-bootstrap,
.dropdown-item,
.navbar-nav .dropdown-menu,
.bg-dark,
.list-group-flush .list-group-item{
    background: #101010 !important;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}
}

@-moz-document domain("search.privacytools.io") {
.searx-navbar,
body,
.search_categories label,
#categories label,
.search_categories .input-group-addon,
#categories .input-group-addon,
.btn-default,
.btn-default.disabled,
.btn-default[disabled],
fieldset[disabled] .btn-default,
.btn-default.disabled:hover,
.btn-default[disabled]:hover,
fieldset[disabled] .btn-default:hover,
.btn-default.disabled:focus,
.btn-default[disabled]:focus,
fieldset[disabled] .btn-default:focus,
.btn-default.disabled:active,
.btn-default[disabled]:active,
fieldset[disabled] .btn-default:active,
.btn-default.disabled.active,
.btn-default[disabled].active,
fieldset[disabled] .btn-default.active,
.infobox .panel-heading,
.table-striped > tbody > tr:nth-child(2n+1) > td,
.table-striped > tbody > tr:nth-child(2n+1) > th,
.panel-default > .panel-heading,
.result-default:hover,
.result-code:hover,
.result-torrent:hover,
.result-videos:hover,
.result-map:hover,
html {
    background: #101010;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.search_categories input[type="checkbox"]:checked + label,
#categories input[type="checkbox"]:checked + label,
#q,
.btn-default:hover,
.btn-default:focus,
.btn-default:active,
.btn-default.active,
.open > .dropdown-toggle.btn-default,
.form-control[disabled],
.form-control[readonly],
fieldset[disabled] .form-control,
.form-control {
    background: #1a1a1a !important;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.result_header a,
.result-content .highlight {
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.highlight,
.result_header a .highlight {
    background: rgb(0, 173, 238) !important;
}
}
